author: Staff Reporter
text:
V.M. Muthukumar, Vice-Chancellor, Bharathidasan University, felicitating S. Thinakara Anand, who won bronze medal in the all-India inter-university fencing competition.

S. Thinakara Anand, representing Bharathidasan University, won the bronze medal at the all-India inter-university fencing competition held in Chandigarh recently.

Anand, a final year B.A. Economics student of St. Joseph’s College here, bagged the third spot in the Foil event.

V.M. Muthukumar, Vice-Chancellor, Bharathidasan University, felicitated Anand in the presence of A. Palanisamy, associate professor and sports secretary, Bharathidasan University.
title: VC fetes fencing medal winner
